pullRequest.title: HDDS-3474. Create transactionInfo Table in OmMetadataManager.
pullRequest.bodyText:
What changes were proposed in this pull request?

introduce a new transaction info table which stores transactionInfo.
Key = TRANSACTIONINFO
value = currentTerm-transactionIndex
Add new UT's for this table.
Provide utility/helper methods to parse the transaction info table value

What is the link to the Apache JIRA
https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/HDDS-3474
How was this patch tested?
Added UT.

nodes.bodyText: Question out of curiosity: In another patch (HDDS-3217), the Keys in DB are suffixed with a #. Is that a just convention followed for ContainerDBs or has any significance?
Can we add a comment here that the transactionIndex corresponds to the Ratis Log Index. Would help if someone is trying to correlate this to Ratis snapshots.

nodes.bodyText: Can we rename RatisLogTable to TransactionInfoTable to avoid confusion.
